post.text: Trump "doesn't look at us as full human beings, with our dreams and our purposes, our own capabilities."

comment.author: Abigail
comment.text: Hillary has no regard for women and children! Wikileak emails showed that Huma and Hillary knew about Huma husband Anthony Weiner sexing with underage girls, yet did nothing: So it would not come out in the news and hurt Hillary when she was Secretary of State. Allowing Anthony Weiner to abuse girls! Never Hillary!! Hillary is such a Hypocrite!
